name: photoswiper
description: A plugin for easy and accessible PhotoSwipe initialization

scripts.build-browser: browserify src/photoswiper.js -s photoswiper -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports ] ] | derequire > dist/photoswiper.browser.js
scripts.build-bundle: browserify src/photoswiper.js -o dist/photoswiper.bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports ] ]
scripts.prepublish: npm run build-browser & npm run build-bundle & npm run build-node

author: Evan Yamanishi
